name: Frog Hunt
description:
★★★Frog Hunt! ★★★

Game Controls:

Arrow Controls to move up and down /Jump

TAB to Switch between Characters

SPACE to Attack 

Cat Player can Craw into Caves

Crow Player can fly and jump into Portals

Credit :  Artwork and Coding By AzulBun

If you've played the game and enjoyed it let know me!
